  • Method Details

    • toJodaFormat

      public static String toJodaFormat(String pattern)
      Replaces all postgres patterns from , available in postgresToJodaMap keys to jodaTime equivalents.
      Parameters:
      pattern - date pattern in postgres format
      Returns:
      date pattern with replaced patterns in joda format
